data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Kaluga, Russia humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kaluga, Russia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Kaluga.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 68 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 15,075 believers in Kaluga, Russia a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Kaluga.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Aleut, Eastern people. 0.6% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Kaluga to exponentially multiply disciples.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 15,075 believers in Kaluga, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kaluga, Russia has a population of 1,030,100.

We estimate Kaluga has 15,075 people who might know Jesus, 578,177 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 436,848 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 1,030,100 citizens of Kaluga, Russia, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.
